alert.note: Alert for Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 4:10PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Douglas and southwestern Arapahoe Counties through 445 PM MDT... At 409 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lone Tree, or 13 miles south of Denver, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Denver, southwestern Aurora, Centennial, Highlands Ranch, Parker, eastern Littleton, Greenwood Village, Lone Tree and Castle Pines. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Elbert, Central and East Douglas Counties Above 6000 Feet; North Douglas County Below 6000 Feet, Denver, West Adams and Arapahoe Counties, East Broomfield County
